ygData.subject: Re: Chains secretly nerfed?
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t speak for the original post er - but for me, PL (and hence lag) seems to have gotten much worse.  When PL is bad - I notice Selo s dropping off.
ygData.messageBody:
I can't speak for the original post'er - but for me, PL (and hence lag)
seems to have gotten much worse. When PL is bad - I notice Selo's dropping
off. Sometimes I just slow down - occasionally even canceling! (I have to
re-click the spell icon).. This could VERY well be the problem. If Selo's
is affected you can assume other spells may be affected n unpredictable ways
as well...

Keep and eye on the lag-o-meter. If that's not the problem - try /bug (not
sure how much they REALLY pay attention to that though...)

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Kyle Sibbald <ksibbald@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, November 07, 1999 10:37 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Chains secretly nerfed?


> From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>
>
> I have not seen anything like this. I can still keep up my 3 song rotation
> without any problems.
>
> Good Journey,
>
> Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
>
>
